ygData.subject: RE: From Casters Realm...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I think this is my first post in this group so figured I should say hi first =) Not that I will get some any time soon with my bard but I would
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I think this is my first post in this group so figured I should say hi first
=)

Not that I will get some any time soon with my bard but I would think of it
as being beer stained =) I know my bard is gonna be a master brewer and be
partying all the time... and from personal experience I know after I have
had a few too many I tend to spill a lot =) Granted I have only seen
screenshots of the armor and they are always darker then in the game... but
I would much rather have beer stained armor then urine stained armor =)

Zylin drunken Wood Elf Bard of 12 songs
Azerin 39th Dark Elf Necromancer

BTW, this is a great list... much better then the other class lists I am on,
I have gotten a lot of useful info so far, even though most of the bard
specific stuff I can't use yet.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

yeah, cute;)
We already get the worst Armor color in the game (A real bard would not wear
Armor that looks Urine stained) and to top it all off, it is the most rarely
dropped now;)
Good job Verant crew!

-Martyn

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 9:38 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] From Casters Realm...


From: jhenders@...


So I guess the fact that supposedly not one piece has been found since
the PoH patch by anyone on any of the servers is just some odd
coincidence of the random generator.

On Tue, Nov 30/99, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> BARDIC PLANE ARMOR
> I just double checked with the dev team to try and resolve this and have
> been informed they have extensively tested this and the Bard armor is
> dropping on public servers.
>
> Guess it's just ultra rare. At least Maestro always has a prsent for them.
>
